intro: Where roads end, your journey begins.
description:
Conquer terrain. Collect parts. Build your beast.

Get behind the wheel of powerful offroad trucks and set out on a mission to recover lost car parts scattered across swamps, hills, and rugged trails. Each location brings its own challenges—from muddy bogs to steep mountain paths—and only the most skilled drivers will make it through.

Explore unique offroad maps, each with its own obstacles and secrets. Gather parts to unlock and build a variety of tough vehicles designed for extreme conditions. With every part you find, you get closer to assembling the ultimate 4x4 machine.

Core Features:

- Diverse Truck Collection: Drive and unlock a wide range of offroad vehicles.
- Unique Locations: Swamps, hills, and wild terrain with realistic physics.
- Part Scavenging: Search and collect car parts to upgrade or unlock new vehicles.
- Exploration & Survival: Navigate unforgiving landscapes and test your offroad skills.

Only the bold conquer the wild. Build your ride, master the terrain, and prove you're the king of offroad.
